explanation: [0-0] In a room with neon lights, a square white screen with dancing silhouettes stands in the center. Two cartoon characters stand on the purple floor, facing forward. The male character on the left has a yellow body, wearing a blue top and green pants, while the female character on the right has a blue and purple body with long red hair.

[0-2] They first turn to look at the white screen behind them, then turn back and imitate the movements of the silhouettes on the screen, smoothly passing through the middle of the silhouettes. At the same time, the white screen turns green, and the lights above change.

The male cartoon character jumps happily, while the female character jumps once and turns to the left with her head down, swaying. At the same time, a white caption with a black background appears at the top of the screen, reading "Help Noob & Mana". On the bottom left is a "YES" button with a green background and a green thumbs-up icon next to it. On the right is a "NO" button with a red background and a red dialogue box icon next to it.
